## bumpObjects.bumpIntoBoundsHandler() function

Creates a handler for bumping objects when they cross fixed bounds.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function bumpIntoBoundsHandler(workspace: WorkspaceSvg): (p1: Abstract) => AnyDuringMigration;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace to handle. |

<b>Returns:</b>

(p1: Abstract) =&gt; AnyDuringMigration
